name: Chaos Laboratory
description:
Play as a scientist, Andrew and attempt to end the chaos in the laboratory. Have they escaped?

This game was originally made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 but the build had compression problems hence it couldn't be submitted there.

Controls

Use WASD to move in the direction relative to your mouse cursor.

Use mouse to aim and left mouse button to shoot.

Press spacebar to use freeze gadget.
